issue.title: [JS] remove rxjs and ix dependency or make them lighter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12270](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12270). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We don't use these dependencies extensively so they could be good candidates for being cleaned up to make the dev setup easier to understand for newcomers.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12270?focusedCommentId=17317417) by Paul Taylor (paul.e.taylor):*
Rx is used for the build scripts, and Ix is used in the IPC tests.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12270?focusedCommentId=17381742) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
We updated them in ARROW-13299.
